name: PAINTDROP
description:
PaintDrop is a game where you fight against yourself, with the help of colors.

The goal is simple:  you have a clone, who's hostile and move the opposite of you, and paint.

This paint allows you to interact with different objects, like the Gate that let pass everything that has the same color, or the zapper that destroys everything that shares its color. 

Using these objects, you must destroy all your clones to go on the next levels.

For now, the game doesn't have any save system to save your progress. But don't worry, for now the game only has two levels + the tutorial.
